Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2021...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 2/15/2022 (Going to CIN: SS Bradly Doty. Going to PHI: P Tomas Vera, SS Brian Navarrete, P Lenny Garrett, P Glenn Gwinn)...
Traded from Philadelphia to St. Louis (B) on 3/2/2022 (Going to SLB: P Kenneth Aldana, SS Brian Navarrete, P Ronald Tostado. Going to PHI: P Bruce Yearwood, 3B Salomon Cobo)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/2022, off Carl Plascencia (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/14/2023, off Philip Finklea (CHI)...
Injured on 8/29/2024 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/5/2025 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 8 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2025...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,495,714 through salary arbitration...
